WITH FilteredBoard AS ( SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE (CASE WHEN #{searchType} = 'title' THEN TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') WHEN #{searchType} = 'content' THEN CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') WHEN #{searchType} = 'titleContent' THEN (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')) ELSE 1 END) ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) AS idx, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM FilteredBoard ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{listLimit} OFFSET #{firstRow}

SELECT * FROM (WITH FilteredBoard AS ( SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE (CASE WHEN #{searchType} = 'title' THEN TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') WHEN #{searchType} = 'content' THEN CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') WHEN #{searchType} = 'titleContent' THEN (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')) ELSE 1 END) ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) AS idx, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM FilteredBoard ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{listLimit} OFFSET #{firstRow}) T2 WHERE IDX = #{id}
